lore: Nurglings are malicious plague mites that pour across the battlefield in giggling masses. These foul imps might seem almost amusing from a distance, yet the illusion is shattered as the Nurglings spill forth to engulf their screaming victims in a rancid avalanche of needle fangs, filthy talons and bloated flesh.

otherAbilities.Mischief Makers (Aura):: While an enemy unit (excluding MONSTERS and VEHICLES ) is within 6" of this unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .
